name: Dreamland Revolution
description:
When a young child's nightmares seem endless, their imaginary friends rise up to banish the evil.  Join Spot, Goldie, and Harry as you command troops against the forces of darkness and bring peace to Dreamland once again.

This is an open source project made in the Godot engine for the Godot Wild Jam #22, with the theme "Revolution".

https://github.com/Inglo-Games/GodotWildJam22
